OUR SMOOTHIE BOWLS

Chicoo Chocoo

(Chicoo + Cacao Powder + Cashew + banana + Dates + Milk of Choice)

Your delightfully Chocolate flavour get a healthy twist in our chicoo chocoo smoothie bowl where creamy chicoo pairs perfectly with unsweetened cacao powder, creating a decadent base enriched with antioxidants and natural sweetness. Topped with luscious banana slices, crunchy cashews, and sweet dates, each spoonful is a symphony of flavors and textures. Finished with a drizzle of your choice of milk, this nourishing bowl is the ultimate treat for both your taste buds and your well-being.

Mango Smurf

(Mango, Banana, Blue Spirulina, Milk)

Get lost in the enchanting world of our seasonal delight, the "Mango Smurf" blue smoothie bowl. Crafted with ripe mangoes, creamy bananas, and a touch of superfood blue spirulina, all blended to perfection with your choice of milk. Indulge in the vibrant hues and tropical flavors of this magical creation, guaranteed to transport your taste buds to blue skies and sunny shores.

Yellow Yoga

(Mango + Pineapple + Banana + Milk)

Indulge in our revitalizing "Yellow Yoga" smoothie, a harmonious blend of ripe mangoes, tangy pineapples, and creamy bananas, fused with the velvety richness of milk. Energize your day with this tropical delight, brimming with vitamins and flavors unlike you ever savoured before.

Banana Peanut Butter Smoothie Bowl

To all the gymoholic rats who love banana and simply can’t resist spoonful of peanut butter daily, here is a simple blend of fibre rich banana with the creamier unsweetened peanut butter with your choice of milk, nuts and seeds makes it an unapologetic favourite. It’s thick consistency and rich flavours are surely going to fill your tummy for long.

Yellow Fever Smoothie Bowl

Experience the vibrant burst of tropical flavors with our Yellow Fever Smoothie Bowl. A tantalizing blend of ripe mangoes, creamy bananas, crisp apples, and succulent papaya creates a luscious base that transports you to sun-soaked shores with every spoonful. Choose your favorite milk to achieve the perfect creamy consistency, then top it off with a sprinkle of seeds and nuts of your choice for added crunch and nutrition

Deadly Dragonfruit Smoothie Bowl

Dragonfruit Smoothie Bowl. Vibrant pink dragonfruit takes center stage, complemented by creamy bananas and crisp apples, all blended to perfection with your choice of milk. Customize your bowl with a selection of nuts and seeds to add a satisfying crunch and boost of nutrition. Indulge in this vibrant and refreshing creation that will invigorate your senses and tantalize your taste buds with every spoonful

Piña-Colada Smoothie Bowl

Transport yourself to a tropical paradise with our Piña-Colada Smoothie Bowl. A harmonious blend of creamy bananas, tangy pineapple, and luscious coconut meat, sweetened with a touch of honey and coconut water. Customize your bowl with your choice of milk for added creaminess, and top it off with a selection of nuts and seeds for a satisfying crunch. Dive into the refreshing flavors of the Caribbean and let this exotic bowl whisk you away

Crazy Coconut Vanilla Smoothie Bowl

Get ready for a taste sensation with our Crazy Coconut Vanilla Smoothie Bowl. Creamy coconut flesh and ripe bananas come together in perfect harmony, blended with luscious coconut milk and a hint of aromatic vanilla essence. Dive into this tropical delight, bursting with rich coconut flavor and a touch of sweet vanilla. Topped with your favorite toppings for added texture and crunch, it's the perfect way to start your day or indulge in a guilt-free treat.

CBerry Berry Good Smoothie Bowl

Embark on a berrylicious journey with our Berry Berry Good Smoothie Bowl. Bursting with the natural sweetness of ripe bananas and a delightful mix of mixed berries including succulent strawberries, exotic mulberries, and plump blueberries, this bowl is a true celebration of berry goodness. Customize your creation with your choice of milk for the perfect creamy consistency, and top it off with a selection of nuts and seeds for added texture and nutrition.
